42 #include "Teuchos_DependencyXMLConverter.hpp"
43 #include "Teuchos_XMLDependencyExceptions.hpp"

46 namespace Teuchos{
47 
48 
49 RCP<Dependency>
50 DependencyXMLConverter::fromXMLtoDependency(
51  const XMLObject& xmlObj,
52  const XMLParameterListReader::EntryIDsMap& entryIDsMap,
53  const IDtoValidatorMap& validatorIDsMap) const
54 {
55  Dependency::ConstParameterEntryList dependees;
56  Dependency::ParameterEntryList dependents;
57 
58  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(xmlObj.findFirstChild(getDependeeTagName()) == -1,
59  MissingDependeesException,
60  "Could not find any dependees for a dependency!"
61  <<std::endl <<std::endl);
62 
63  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(xmlObj.findFirstChild(getDependentTagName()) == -1,
64  MissingDependentsException,
65  "Could not find any dependents for a dependency!"
66  <<std::endl <<std::endl);
67 
68  for(int i=0; i<xmlObj.numChildren(); ++i){
69  XMLObject child = xmlObj.getChild(i);
70  if(child.getTag() == getDependeeTagName()){
71  ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID dependeeID =
72  child.getRequired<ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID>(
73  getParameterIdAttributeName());
74 
75  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(entryIDsMap.find(dependeeID) == entryIDsMap.end(),
76  MissingDependeeException,
77  "Can't find a Dependee ParameterEntry associated with the ID: " <<
78  dependeeID << std::endl << std::endl);
79  dependees.insert(entryIDsMap.find(dependeeID)->second);
80  }
81  else if(child.getTag() == getDependentTagName()){
82  ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID dependentID =
83  child.getRequired<ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID>(
84  getParameterIdAttributeName());
85 
86  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(entryIDsMap.find(dependentID) == entryIDsMap.end(),
87  MissingDependentException,
88  "Can't find a Dependent ParameterEntry associated with the ID: " <<
89  dependentID << std::endl << std::endl);
90  dependents.insert(entryIDsMap.find(dependentID)->second);
91  }
92  }
93 
94  return convertXML(
95  xmlObj, dependees, dependents, entryIDsMap, validatorIDsMap);
96 }
97 
98 XMLObject
99 DependencyXMLConverter::fromDependencytoXML(
100  const RCP<const Dependency> dependency,
101  const XMLParameterListWriter::EntryIDsMap& entryIDsMap,
102  ValidatortoIDMap& validatorIDsMap) const
103 {
104  XMLObject toReturn(Dependency::getXMLTagName());
105 
106  toReturn.addAttribute(getTypeAttributeName(),
107  dependency->getTypeAttributeValue());
108 
109  Dependency::ConstParameterEntryList::const_iterator it =
110  dependency->getDependees().begin();
111 
112  for(;it != dependency->getDependees().end(); ++it){
113  XMLObject currentDependee(getDependeeTagName());
114  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(entryIDsMap.find(*it) == entryIDsMap.end(),
115  MissingDependeeException,
116  "Can't find the Dependee of a dependency in the given " <<
117  "EntryIDsMap. Occured when converting " <<
118  "to XML" << std::endl << std::endl);
119  currentDependee.addAttribute<ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID>(
120  getParameterIdAttributeName(), entryIDsMap.find(*it)->second);
121  toReturn.addChild(currentDependee);
122  }
123 
124  it = dependency->getDependents().begin();
125  for(; it != dependency->getDependents().end(); ++it){
126  XMLObject currentDependent(getDependentTagName());
127  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(entryIDsMap.find(*it) == entryIDsMap.end(),
128  MissingDependentException,
129  "Can't find the Dependent of a dependency in the given " <<
130  "ValidatordIDsMap.. Occured when converting " <<
131  "to XML" << std::endl << std::endl);
132  currentDependent.addAttribute<ParameterEntry::ParameterEntryID>(
133  getParameterIdAttributeName(), entryIDsMap.find(*it)->second);
134  toReturn.addChild(currentDependent);
135  }
136 
137  convertDependency(dependency, toReturn, entryIDsMap, validatorIDsMap);
138 
139  return toReturn;
140 }
141 
142 
143 } // namespace Teuchos
